title: ethgasfee
author: ethgasfee
content: HelloA friend needs online marketing campaigns both on social media and forums, telegram etc. Budget is low.Long term partnership is key.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: The more information, the greater the chances of you getting a professional. Which countries for example? What is the company's segment/industry?Give more details about the proposal.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: With a low budget, i don't think anybody would be interested for a long term partnership.I advice you to describe the project concept in the "project development" board, asking for partners and potential investors. Good Luck

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Pm me for discussing the plan. telegram @sujonali1819

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Can you please be more specific? What kind of marketing do you need and what is the project your friend working on? If it's a crypto project then hard to do marketing with a low budget among most social media. There is a lot of marketing source even outside of the forum. So it depends on the budget and project. Please write more briefly, I have been working with a couple of crypto projects as a marketing incubator. So let's discuss telegram or DM more details.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ethgasfee on October 13, 2022, 04:40:38 PMHelloA friend needs online marketing campaigns both on social media and forums, telegram etc. Budget is low.Long term partnership is key.Hi, send me your telegram I have 7 forums that are Cryptocurrency related and over 80 Facebook groups that are advertising and Cryptocurrency related if it's ok send me the project link, all the other offers here are all great, if you have a huge budget you can get 3 to 5 promoters for your project to take off, the most important thing is what kind of project you have even a description will do.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Send me a message on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: ethgasfee on October 13, 2022, 04:40:38 PMHelloA friend needs online marketing campaigns both on social media and forums, telegram etc. Budget is low.Long term partnership is key.Can you tell me what project you need promote? Is it a website that provides gambling (or some other services ) or is it about any altcoin which you want to promote through marketing? Also when you say you have a low budget, can you tell me exactly how much you will be willing to pay for this marketing campaign so only those contact you can work in the budget you will tell?Quote from: coupable on October 13, 2022, 04:54:46 PMWith a low budget, i don't think anybody would be interested for a long term partnership.Not necessary as if OP is promoting an altcoin, he can just start a bounty campaign on bitcointalk and pay in the native token. This way he won't be spending any money and yet promoting his project. This is being done by many projects already and OP can also do it. Although if he had budget and can spend some dollars on marketing, that would have been more effective.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Are you in need of each of that posts or you're needing one person to manage all of those marketing? If you'll be needing a separate for social media and outside the forum management, I want to know more. But let's discuss other specific details and how much that low budget you're talking about. Just post most of the details and edit your first post so it's publicly known what project you have.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I wouldn't likeÂ  consuming much of your time but whenever such post is been made you have to be active to respond to post on the thread, throwing more light on your request is also appreciated than just created a post and never replied or respond to users.Please we can discuss more on telegram @cryptomiles1 or inbox me here in the forum.
